item.title: Teaching
item.description: This page provides teaching materials for the courses I’ve developed and taught. Below, you’ll find links to slides, assignments, and additional resources. Feel free to use and share them. Research Methods This is an undergraduate criminology and criminal justice research methods course. The course material was adapted from CRCJ 2510 Research Methods course. GitHub: https://github.com/nvietto/Teaching/tree/main/CRCJ-2510 Applied Statistics This is an undergraduate criminology and criminal justice applied statistics course. GitHub: https://github.com/nvietto/Teaching/tree/main/CRCJ-3000
